node.name: Enumerating System Info
node.rich_text:
In the OS Build & Service Pack, here it is given the build is 7600 and Service Pack 1 This is helpful during privilege escalation
By enumrating installed updates/hotfixes, we will be able to identify the patched services and with that info we are able to select which are all the exploit can be used against the system.
Here we exploited a rejetto vulnerability and got the meterpreter session

The ‘systeminfo’ command in the shell gives you more comprehensive info
To get more info about the hotfix
